title: Party Essentials N15090 Brights Hard Plastic Shot Glass, 1 oz. Capacity, Assorted Neon Pink/Green/Blue/Orange (Case of 1000)
features: Disposable plastic shot glass is suitable for measuring, dispensing, or serving beverages, gelatins, custards, nuts, candies, and other small food items
Made of hard plastic for strength
Assorted translucent pink, green, blue, and orange neon colors coordinate with the Party Essentials Brights product line and other brightly colored tableware
description: This Party Essentials N15090 disposable plastic shot glass comes in assorted neon colors, has a 1 oz. capacity, and is suitable for measuring, dispensing, or serving beverages, gelatins, custards, nuts, candies, and other small food items. It come in 20 packs of 50 plastic shot glasses in assorted translucent pink, green, blue, and orange neon colors to coordinate with the Party Essentials Brights product line and other brightly colored tableware.

Party Essentials manufactures disposable tableware including cutlery, drinkware, and dinnerware for the consumer goods, catering, and food service industries. The company, founded in 1983, is headquartered in Elk Grove Village, IL.
